hero.description:
Here technology education is combined with real practical knowledge and skills. Since the day we started, our main goal has been to train the next generation of IT professionals through high-quality, practical and career-oriented training programs.

At JET Academy we believe technology is the language of the future — and everyone should have the opportunity to learn it. Our mission is to make IT education accessible, effective and inspiring for people of all ages and educational backgrounds.

courseInfo.title: Course Fields
courseInfo.description: At JET Academy, course fields are formed in line with the requirements of the modern labor market. Each field's programs are based on practical knowledge, real projects and professional development opportunities.

about.title: What Makes Us Different?
about.description: Discover the main features that distinguish us from other courses

interactive.title: Modern and Continuously Updated Curriculum
interactive.description: Our programs are regularly updated to match the demands of the job market and cover the latest technologies.

experienced.title: Real Projects and Daily Assignments
experienced.description: Each of our courses is enriched with practical tasks and projects that reflect real-world work environments.

individual.title: Highly Experienced and Professional Instructors
individual.description: Industry professionals share their knowledge and support students in building successful careers.

future.title: Comfortable Learning Environment and Modern Equipment
future.description: We provide a productive learning atmosphere equipped with modern technology to make the training process more effective.

price.title: High-Quality Training at Affordable Prices
price.description: Our pricing policy makes quality education accessible for everyone.

comfort.title: Conveniently Located Office
comfort.description: Our office located in the city center provides convenience for students in terms of transport.

intro.title: Introduction to Computer Engineering
intro.description: Learn about the role and importance of computers in our daily lives. Get to know the main components such as CPU, RAM, GPU.

algorithms.title: Algorithms and Decision Making
algorithms.description: Learn the algorithms that form the basis of programming. Develop algorithmic thinking to solve real-life problems.

scratch.title: Programming with Scratch
scratch.description: Learn the basics of coding with block-based programming. Create games using variables and loops.

games.title: Game Development and Design
games.description: Create games with Scratch and learn modern design principles with Figma. Introduction to 3D modeling.

webIntro.title: Introduction to Web Programming
webIntro.description: Learn the basics of HTML. Master the tags needed to build the structure of web pages.

webDev.title: Web Pages with HTML and CSS
webDev.description: Create modern web pages with CSS layouts and Flexbox. Master animations and responsive design.

JS.title: JavaScript Fundamentals
JS.description: Learn the fundamentals of the JavaScript programming language. Get familiar with variables, operators, functions and OOP concepts. Practical assignments help apply the knowledge in real projects.

JsDom.title: JavaScript DOM and Projects
JsDom.description: Learn DOM manipulation, event listeners and timer functions. Build real projects like a To-Do app, counter, and digital clock. Create user interfaces using Bootstrap 5.

python.title: Python and Cybersecurity
python.description: Learn Python in the context of cybersecurity. Create security scripts and tools.

network.title: Network Security
network.description: Learn the basics of TCP/IP, UDP protocols and network security. Create port scanner tools.

footer.address: Baku, Olimpiya Street 6A (near Ganjlik metro station, close to the Ministry of Sports)
footer.tagline: Inspiring education for a brighter future
footer.newsletterDesc: Stay updated with our latest news and offers

feedbacks.title: Our Students' Reviews
feedbacks.description: Watch real stories shared by our students about the knowledge and skills they gained at JET Academy.

blogs.title: Blog & Media
blogs.description: Follow the latest updates, useful blogs, campaigns, and news here.

introduction.title: About Us
introduction.description1: Since 2021, JET Academy has established itself as one of the leading training centers in the country's technology sector and has trained hundreds of highly skilled professionals.
introduction.description2: We provide students with practical skills through real equipment and projects, offering short and effective courses so that knowledge can be quickly applied in the professional world.
introduction.description3: Our programs cover modern and in-demand fields and are delivered by professional, highly experienced instructors. Each program is designed following international standards, ensuring students gain real-world experience. We also support our graduates' career growth by connecting them with partner companies.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to provide accessible, engaging and effective IT education for everyone using modern technologies, professional instructors and experience-based teaching methods — developing critical thinking, creativity and technical skills to train qualified specialists in technology.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: Our vision is to nurture the future leaders of the digital era by supporting the development of an innovative and problem-solving generation. We aim to deliver internationally-standard, technology-based education to improve young people's knowledge and skills.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.description: All instructors at JET Academy are highly experienced professionals in their field, distinguished by their pedagogical skills.
